document.discussion_title: Cornwall Live: Breaking news, traffic, travel and weather for Friday, August 12 | West Briton
document.topic_text: Comments (0) Welcome to our live coverage of all the day's biggest stories, traffic and travel from across Cornwall. It's Gareth here with updates on everything happening in the county, here until around 2pm when I'll hand over to the team from the Late Desk. If you've seen something going on and want us to check it out, or have a traffic update for us, please get in touch - call the newsdesk on 01872 247536, email or tweet us at @westbriton , @cornishguardian or @cornishman . The news feed will load below in just a few seconds...
